name: detach
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to separate or remove something from something else that it is connected to: You can detach the hood if you prefer the coat without it.detach something from something Detach the lower part of the form from this letter and return it to the above address. Compare
attach (CONNECT)

to separate or remove something from something else that it is connected to: Detach the lower half of the form and return it to the above address.
Add to word list
Add to word list
to separate or remove something from something else that it is joined to: detach sth from sth Detach the reply slip from this letter and return it to the above address. Compare
attach
